sections.PROJECT:
uses the simple concept of OHMs law. When any fault like short circuit 
occurs, voltage drop will vary depending on the length of fault in cable, since the 
current varies. 
 we detect the exact location of short circuit fault in the underground cable from 
feeder end in kilometers by using microcontroller 8051. So, it can be easily detected 
and repaired.
